section_text: 1 The  Pet Animals Act 1951 shall be amended as follows:— a in section 2 (Pets not to be sold in streets, etc.), there shall be substituted for the word “except” the word “or”; b in subsection (3) of section 7 (Interpretation) there shall be omitted the words “ premises ” includes any stall or barrow in a market, but save as aforesaid does not include any stall or barrow or any part of a street or public place .

2 1 This Act may be cited as the Pet Animals Act 1951 (Amendment) Act 1982. 2 This Act shall come into operation at the end of a period of six months beginning with the day on which it is passed. 3 This Act does not apply to Northern Ireland.
